column1: #Text=Tenzin says : " His pupils pleaded with their master to eat something , but he refused , just like he had each day during summer .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Anyone besides Otaku , who already studied this in his acolyte training ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " And is answering every question .
#Text=Now , on day ninety - eight ... " Bumi says : " Greetings , air people .
#Text=I come seeking boring stories to take back to the Spirit World .
#Text=When do we get to fly around on our own sky bison like that ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Only after many years of practice and intense training .
#Text=Besides , we do n't have enough bison here for all of you .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Actually , the plural of bison is bison .
#Text=" Kai says : " Can we ride those ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " No , that 's a wild herd .
#Text=It would take many years to tame them .
#Text=Now , let 's get back to our lessons .
